nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.accountfees
Interface AccountFeeServiceLocal

All Superinterfaces:
AccountFeeService, Service
All Known Implementing Classes:
AccountFeeServiceImpl
public interface AccountFeeServiceLocal
extends AccountFeeService

Local interface. It must be used only from other services.
